oxeva.title: Oxeva / Nua.ge
oxeva.subtitle: Integration into the development team of Nua.ge, an IaaS cloud service, during a complete refactoring of the React codebase.
oxeva.description: Sprint planning, code reviews, and close collaboration with the PO. Refactor to make the code more efficient and maintainable, while improving existing interfaces. Added features, associated tests, and documentation. Took over responsibility for the JS SDK, published on NPM.

restaurant.title: Restaurant order taking application
restaurant.subtitle: Mock-up, design and conception of a web app for restaurant ordering and a mobile app for order management from scratch.
restaurant.description: Project planning with Trello and Notion. Mock-ups done with Whimsical. React and Next.js for the front-end + Chakra-UI for the interface. Use of Next.js serverless API routes (Node.js). Firebase for auth, database, and notifications. Integration of Stripe API for payments. Web app deployed on Vercel in continuous integration. Mobile app coded with React Native and deployed via Fastlane and Firebase App Distribution.
